Doomsday Sayers Wrong Again
1.     Average Global Temperature prediction for 2020 in 1987 Plus 3C higher
2020 - Reality: Average temp only 0.44C higher.
2.    1978: CO2 levels to double from 1978 to 2020
2020 - Reality: CO2 only ~23% from 1978 to 2020
3.    2009: China to cut emissions 40-45% below 2005 level by 2020; India to cut 20-25%.
2020 - Reality: China 2020 emissions ~85% HIGHER than 2005; India ~150% HIGHER.
4.    2008: Snow on Kilimanjaro to vanish by 2020.
 2020 - Reality: Yup. Snow still there.
5.    1986: EPA predicts 2 feet of sea level rise for Florida by 2020.
2020 - Reality: Sea level rise + subsidence in S. Florida since 1986 is less than 4 inches.
6.    2000: By 2020 snow will be so unfamiliar, people won‚Äôt know how to deal with it.
2020 - Reality: It still snows a lot.
7.    2000: Global warming will ruin Pacific Island Nations economies by 2020.
2020 - Reality: As of 2019, Tuvalu, for example, having 6-year economic growth spurt.
8.    2004: Pentagon -climate change-caused shortages to cause global war by 2020.
2020 - Reality: Nations largely at peace. Planet only at war with coronavirus.
9.    2013: Arctic ice-free by 2020.
2020- Reality: The prediction was 3.9 million sq. miles wrong at the annual min. September 20202.
10. 2009: Glaciers gone from Glacier National Park by 2020.
2020 - Reality: All glaciers present , the signs saying they would be gone, are gone!
